title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 about dialogue and conversation sumarization
<|assistant|>
Here is a list of 20 articles about dialogue and conversation, along with summaries up to 2023. Please note that some of these articles may not have been published in 2023
note: but they were published before or after that year.

title: The Art of Dialogue: A Guide to Effective Communication
